channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: GOP megabill expected to pass by July 4. And, what's next after Sean Combs' verdict

item.title: House Republicans expected to pass Trump's massive tax and policy bill by July 4

item.title: Bryan Kohberger pleads guilty in murders of 4 University of Idaho students
item.description: Bryan Kohberger pleaded guilty Wednesday in the stabbing murders of four University of Idaho students after reaching a plea agreement for the 2022 kil...

item.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court rules 1849 law does not ban abortion in the state
item.description: The Wisconsin State Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that an 1849 law does not amount to an abortion ban, keeping access to abortion in the state in p...

item.title: Diogo Jota, Liverpool Soccer Star, Dies in Car Crash at 28
item.description: Mr. Jota and his brother André Filipe died in Spain, the authorities said. The crash came two weeks after the Portuguese player’s wedding.

item.title: Supreme Court Agrees to Hear Cases Involving Transgender Athletes
item.description: The court announced it would hear challenges to state laws barring transgender athletes from girls’ and women’s sports.

item.title: The U.S. labor market remains solid, with employers adding 147,000 jobs last month
item.description: U.S. employers added 147,000 jobs in June as the unemployment rate dipped to 4.1%. Job gains were concentrated in health care and state and local gove...

item.title: What to Know About the Heat Wave in Europe
item.description: Some parts of Western Europe were starting to cool off as the extreme heat that has gripped the continent moved east.

item.title: North Korea Opens Beach Resort, Hoping to Attract Foreign Tourists
